GOVERNMENT OF INDIA

A-WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :   4.12.2006 
 
Circular No. 22/ 2006 
 
Subject:- 
Verification and escort of firearms  to be carried  in hold  
baggage. 
 
Each aircraft operator operating to / from airports in India shall be 
responsible to   ensure that only authorized and duly qualified persons are made 
responsible to verify that authorized firearms of passengers are unloaded prior to 
carriage on an aircraft. Appropriately authorized and duly qualified officers of the 
concerned aircraft operator shall  escort firearms from the check-in point into the 
security restricted area until deposited in the aircraft hold.  
 
2. 
Procedures of handling / operations of firearms shall be developed in the  
Basic  Aviation/ refresher Security  Training  programme for  aircraft personnel 
who  will be deployed   for checking and handling  firearms of   authorized 
passengers.  
 
3. 
The  above  instructions  shall be implemented  with immediate effect. 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
 
Distribution  as per  list  attached.
